code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import axios from"axios";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Visited(){const[destinations,setDestinations]=useState([]);const fetchVisited=async()=>{const res=await axios.get("http://localhost:5000/destinations");setDestinations(res.data.filter(d=>d.status==="Visited"));};useEffect(()=>{fetchVisited();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"p-6 max-w-4xl mx-auto",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"text-2xl font-bold mb-4",children:"Visited Places \u2705"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"space-y-4",children:destinations.map(d=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"p-4 bg-green-100 rounded shadow",children:d.name},d.id))})]});}export default Visited;
